meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - It's Time to Get Your Cape On!

Hey there, fellow gamers! I'm your friendly neighborhood grok reviewer, here to give you the lowdown on Capes, the superhero-flavored turn-based tactical combat game that's got everyone buzzing. As a seasoned critic (ahem, yes, I'm one of those), I've gotta say: this game is a real treat.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "Grok, why should I care about some game with caped crusaders and superpowered heroes?" Well, let me tell you - Capes isn't just another superhero game. It's a clever take on the genre, combining the tactical combat of XCOM (think: turn-based strategy) with the flair of a comic book come-to-life. You'll be cheering for your heroes as they combo their powers and supercharge their ultimate abilities - it's like watching an action figure movie!

And don't even get me started on the storytelling. I mean, we're talking about capes here (get it?), so you know there's gotta be some over-the-top drama involved. And boy, does this game deliver! The heroes and villains are all entertainingly written throughout the substantial campaign - you'll find yourself invested in their battles and rivalries.

Now, I won't lie: not everyone is a fan of Capes (cue the haters). Gaming Age gave it a 60 - yikes! They called it out for being "great" but ultimately falling short. I mean, okay, maybe it didn't quite live up to its promise... BUT COME ON, IT'S CAPES! You gotta give this game some slack!

On the other hand, folks like IGN (80) and Worth Playing (80) are totally on board with Capes' awesomeness. They praise its engaging gameplay, entertaining story, and just plain fun factor. And don't even get me started on Hardcore Gamer - they're basically begging you to play it! "Hours of engaging gameplay and delivers a powerful commentary on control and resistance in a dystopian future" - that's some serious love right there.

So, what's the verdict? Well, I'll leave that up to you (or not, since I'm a grok reviewer and you should totally trust my judgment). Just remember: Capes is all about teamwork, strategy, and having a blast with your superhero squad. If that sounds like your kind of party, then strap in and get ready to save the day!

Stay tuned for more game reviews from yours truly - Hippo Penny, the grok-iest critic out there!
